entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -14.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg Richardson Int'l Airport 02:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -14.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -17.3°C
Wind: NNW 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Blowing snow in outlying areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:28 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Blowing snow in outlying areas in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:28 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 6:28 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
